channel.title: artificial neural networks on Adolfo Álvarez
channel.description: Recent content in artificial neural networks on Adolfo Álvarez

item.title: Multicriteria Prediction and Simulation of Winter Wheat Yield Using Extended Qualitative and Quantitative Data Based on Artificial Neural Networks
item.description: The presented models can be used in large-area agriculture, especially in precision agriculture as an important element of decision-making support systems.
